reviews.title: I love this little milk can!
reviews.review_text: This milk can is SO adorable! I didn't realize that the color isn't white - it's actually a very soft light blue, but that makes me love it even more! The item description says it isn't waterproof, but the seller actually put a clear plastic container inside in case you want to add fresh flowers. I just used mine for silk ivy, but it just too cute for words! ðŸ«
